PARAM.name: cequinox
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Equinox of the image world coordinate system (WCS).

PARAM.name: ctype
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Orthographic Projection. The first image axis represents right ascension and the second represents declination.

PARAM.name: bunit
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: The units used to represent bandpass values.

FIELD.name: name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Concise description of the image returned.

FIELD.name: download
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Image access reference URL.

FIELD.name: center_ra
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: ICRS right-ascension of the image center.

FIELD.name: center_dec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: ICRS declination of the image center.

FIELD.name: naxes
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of Image Axes.

FIELD.name: naxis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An array giving the length in pixels of each image axis.

FIELD.name: scale
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An array giving the scale in degrees per pixel of each image axis.

FIELD.name: format
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: MIME-type of the object pointed to by the image access reference URL.

FIELD.name: crpix
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An array specifying the image pixel coordinates of the WCS reference pixel.

FIELD.name: crval
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An array specifying the world coordinates of the WCS reference pixel.

FIELD.name: crota2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Twist in degrees about Image Center, +AXIS2 West of North (J2000)

FIELD.name: band
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 2MASS Image Band

FIELD.name: bref
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The reference wavelength of the 2MASS Image Filter.

FIELD.name: bhi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Upper wavelength limit of the 2MASS Image Filter.

FIELD.name: blo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Lower wavelength limit of the 2MASS Image Filter.

FIELD.name: pers_art
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Persistence artifacts URL

FIELD.name: glint_art
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Filter glint artifacts URL

FIELD.name: type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Type of Image (Q=Quicklook; A=Atlas)

FIELD.name: dataset
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The 2MASS dataset the image belongs to.

FIELD.name: pixflags
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Pixel flags of source image

FIELD.name: id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the search constraint the FITS Image was found/retrieved for

FIELD.name: scntr
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field will contain null values unless the meta-data table is the result of a query involving a list of constraints (positions, coadd_keys, or DHSs). When non-null, the value of this column is an integer identifier for the search constraint the FITS Image was found/retrieved for.

FIELD.name: date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The reference date of the FITS image, in yymmdd format (yy: last 2 digits of the observation year, mm: integer month, dd: integer day). This can differ by one day from the actual UT observation date.

FIELD.name: hem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The hemisphere of the 2MASS observatory where the FITS image was taken. There are only two possible values: 'n' = north (Mt. Hopkins), and 's' = south (Cerro Tololo).

FIELD.name: scan
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nightly scan number of the FITS image.

FIELD.name: image
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The image number of the FITS image.

FIELD.name: ut_date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: UT when the FITS image was taken, in yymmdd format (yy: last 2 digits of the observation year, mm: integer month, dd: integer day).

FIELD.name: coadd_key
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The coadd_key value of the FITS image. This is a unique identifier for the observation date, observatory hemisphere, nightly scan number, and image number of the FITS image. Each source in the 2MASS All-Sky Point and Extended Source Catalogs is tagged with a coadd_key value identifying the 2MASS Image Set it was extracted from.

FIELD.name: seesh
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Seeing Full Width Half Maximum (in arcseconds)

FIELD.name: magzp
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Photometric zero-point magnitude of the FITS image.

FIELD.name: msnr10
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Approximate SNR=10 magnitude of the FITS image.

FIELD.name: bin
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the HTM triangle (subdivision level 7) containing the FITS image reference location.

TR.TD: All-Sky Release Survey K-Band Atlas Image: 981003 n 044 0138
All-Sky Release Survey K-Band Atlas Image: 981003 n 045 0138
